name: Word Challengers: Spanish Question Words
description:
Word Challengers: Spanish Question Words is a simple group flashcard game to practice Spanish question words. 

Instructions:

  1. Select the number of players (1-4) and enter in your names.
  2. Decide how many points you want to go to.
  3. You will be presented with a random question word. The first person to correctly give the word in the opposite language (Spanish-English or English-Spanish) gets a point.
  4. If someone gives an incorrect answer, however, they will lose a point.
  5. Click on the eye icon to show the translation for that particular question word.
  6. Points are manually added or subtracted by clicking the + or - next to the player name.
  7. The first person to reach the score you have agreed to will win!

Note: The background audio may not work in Explorer or Safari, if you want to hear the music, it is recommended you use Chrome.
